snippet: As the Obama administration follows through with its strategy to accelerate the deportation hearings for children from Central America, New York advocacy groups scramble to provide legal representation.
abstract: Advocacy groups for immigrants are rushing to prepare for special new court procedures in New York City that will accelerate deportation hearings for unaccompanied minors and families with children who have arrived in surge from Central America; immigrants could be deported in a matter of months rather than years, which is the usual time frame in an overburdened immigration court system.
lead_paragraph: As the Obama administration follows through with its strategy to accelerate the deportation hearings for children from Central America, New York advocacy groups scramble to provide legal representation.

headline.main: Advocates in New York Scramble as Child Deportation Cases Are Accelerated
headline.print_headline: Advocates Seek Strategy to Help Children Facing Accelerated Deportation
